metadata.title: CVE-2024-23849 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
In rds_recv_track_latency in net/rds/af_rds.c in the Linux kernel through6.7.1, there is an off-by-one error for an RDS_MSG_RX_DGRAM_TRACE_MAXcomparison, resulting in out-of-bounds access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-23849` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-152-generic - 5.4.0-181.201~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-152-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-181.201~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-152-lowlatency - 5.4.0-181.201~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-152-generic - 5.4.0-181.201~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-152-lowlatency - 5.4.0-181.201~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1104-aws - 5.4.0-1124.134~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1110-azure - 5.4.0-1129.136~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1107-gcp - 5.4.0-1128.137~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1051-ibm - 5.4.0-1071.76~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1103-oracle - 5.4.0-1123.132~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-5.4.0-1088-raspi - 5.4.0-1108.120~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
